Torch.description: A short term light source with a small range of visible light. Easier to find, but not as reliable.

Lantern.description: A long lasting light source with a good range of visible light.

Electric Torch.description: The longest lasting light source with a very good range of visible light. Expensive and harder to find than a lantern.

Oil.description: Oil for refilling a lantern or applying to a torch.

Pharmaceuticals.description: Western medicine's chemical solution to psychological and physiological maladies. Helps minimize anxiety and placate fears. For a while...

First Aid Kit.description: A basic first aid kit to patch up minor wounds.
